Text: Tax Return QuestionnaireMemo from Philip Hawkins of PricewaterhouseCoopers Start of message text I should be grateful if you would reply to this email immediately to confirm safe receipt of your Tax Return Questionnaire Dear Danny As you may be aware the latest UK tax year ended on April and we at PricewaterhouseCoopers have been authorised to prepare your return for Due to the success of the electronic Tax Return Questionnaire TRQ for we are circulating the TRQs electronically again this year The TRQ is attached below and requests information on personal circumstances and personal income that we are only able to obtain from the assignee themselves Please be aware that Enron will provide all necessary information regarding income from your employment Please note that you may have provided the majority of this information when we prepared your US income tax return or in previous UK Tax Return questionnaires If this is the case please annote the questionnaire accordingly I would like to remind you that the UK tax year runs from April to April so any information provided with the US questionnaire ETDO may not cover the entire UK tax period Please ensure you provide us with the additional information relating to the period from January to April See attached file Foreign Nationals ETDO vxls The main topics addressed in the TRQ include Personal Details Workdays Home Leave Trips Stock Option Activity UK BankBuilding Society Interest UK Dividends UK Capital Gains Remittances Pensions UK Charitable Contributions The TRQ is in the format of an Excel file When completing the TRQ you have the option to either Enter the necessary details within the spreadsheet save it and return it to PwC by email or Print off the TRQ complete it manually and return by fax or post to PwC along with any relevant supporting documentation I would suggest however that if you only have a limited amount of information to provide that it may prove more efficient to print off the TRQ and complete it manually We should be very grateful if you could return the completed TRQ to PwC by August at the latest Should you have any queries regarding the completion of the TRQ or UK tax in general then please do not hesitate to contact either me John White James Sharman or Julia McWilliams Our contact details are John White Direct Dial Fax Email Philip Hawkins Direct Dial Fax Email James Sharman Direct Dial Fax Email Julia McWilliams Direct Dial Fax Email We will respond at the earliest possible opportunity Should you chose to post your completed TRQ then please mail it to Philip Hawkins PricewaterhouseCoopers Savannah House Ocean Way Ocean Village Southampton SO TJ We look forward to receiving your completed TRQ and working with you on your UK taxes Kind regards Philip Hawkins End of message text The principal place of business of PricewaterhouseCoopers and its associate partnerships is Embankment Place London WCN NN where lists of the partners names are available for inspection All partners in the associate partnerships are authorised to conduct business as agents of and all contracts for services to clients are with PricewaterhouseCoopers The UK firm of PricewaterhouseCoopers is authorised by the Institute of Chartered Accountants in England and Wales to carry on investment business PricewaterhouseCoopers is a member of the worldwide PricewaterhouseCoopers organisation The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Foreign Nationals ETDO vxls
